uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data

Interface FieldValue<T,X>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of field data
    X - type of owning DataObject
    All Superinterfaces:
    Accessor<T,X>, SQLAccessor<T,X>, SQLValue<T>, Targetted<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FieldSQLExpression<T,X>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanFieldExpression, DateFieldExpression, FieldExpression, IndexedFieldValue, NumberFieldExpression, StringFieldExpression, TimestampDateFieldExpression, TypeProducerFieldValue

    public interface FieldValue<T,X>
extends SQLAccessor<T,X>
    SQLAccessor that represents a field in the DataBase
    Author:
    spb

    • Method Detail

      • getFieldName

        java.lang.String getFieldName()
        Get the corresponding field name. This should not be used to create SQL fragments but can be used to identify Repository field names
        Returns:
        database field name

      • setObject

        void setObject(java.sql.PreparedStatement stmt,
             int pos,
             T value)
               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Add an object of the target type to a prepared statement doing any necessary type conversion to map it to the SQL representation of the object. Note this is only valid if canSet from SQLAccessor returns true.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        stmt -
        pos -
        value -
